# revrepo

Displays Reverse Repo.

### Usage

```python wordwrap
/revrepo [days]
```

---

## Parameters

| Name | Description | Optional | Choices |
| ---- | ----------- | -------- | ------- |
| days | Number of days to display. Default: 50 | True | None |


---

## Examples

```
/revrepo days:35
```

```
/revrepo
```

---
